column4: can anybody tell me why i need to install ubuntu-desktop before upgrading to fiesty
can anybody tell me why i need to install ubuntu-desktop before upgrading to fiesty
feisty upgrade uses the ubuntu-desktop meta pacakage as a ref for the upgrade proceedure
which ever you prefer
: whats the difference
: can't i have everything
you don'T need 3 different window managers
: i just wanna see difference
you can install all 3 and log into either as you boot and check them out if you want
fr00d  I think I heard it was taken out of hte repos,  check the adobe site for it
you are not being ignored , we just donT' know how to fix your problem,  just try commenting out the edgy lines
: i have two os on two partitions and i require two boots every time to start! can u believe it?
that's ridiculous,  grub should list all your os and allows you to boot directly to wich ever
does one boot manager boot up the next ? osr someting
: yes absolutely one entry on menu.lst boots other only the secondth time though
well you can manualy edit menu.lst with   gksu gedit /boot/grub/menu.lst
what will i edit it as?
there are complex UUID's stored!
maybe you should try asking for help in #grub
: ok
that is not what I said at all,  do not put words in my mount
